title: FS: 1928 Block Bros. and 1932 NY Giants Hubbell PCs all sold
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: 1928 Block Bros. and 1932 NY Giants Hubbell PCs all sold
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to sell my 1928 Block Bros. St.Louis Postcard and my 1932 NY Giants Carl Hubbell Postcard.  I accept  PayPal, check or MO   for   these.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for regular   PayPal.  Domestic shipping is $3.50.  Shipping to other countries, I will work  with you on price.  

Scans available on  request.

1928 Block Bros. St.Louis, featuring Hall of Famers  Rabbit Maranville, Jesse Haines, Grover Cleveland Alexander, Jim  Bottomley, Frankie Frisch, Chick Hafey and manager Bill McKechnie, ungraded, trimmed at the bottom- $[STRIKE]35[/STRIKE]sold


1932 NY Giants Carl Hubbell, SGC 40 (3)-$[STRIKE]35[/STRIKE]sold

 PM, or e-mail with questions or offers ( [URL="skeltone@rocketmail.com"]skeltone@rocketmail.com[/URL]  ). A firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
